trans-unit.source: An abstract base class that implements the <xref:System.IAsyncResult> interface.
trans-unit.target: 實作抽象基底類別<xref:System.IAsyncResult>介面。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Serves as a base class from which to derive <xref:System.IAsyncResult> objects that can be used for common asynchronous programming scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 做為要從中衍生的基底類別<xref:System.IAsyncResult>可用於一般的非同步程式設計案例的物件。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.IAsyncResult?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IAsyncResult?displayProperty=fullName>介面。</xref:System.IAsyncResult?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.TypedAsyncResult%601> class derives from AsyncResult.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IdentityModel.TypedAsyncResult%601>類別衍生自 AsyncResult。</xref:System.IdentityModel.TypedAsyncResult%601>

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref> class that does not have a callback delegate or a state object.
trans-unit.target: 從建構函式來初始化的執行個體的衍生類別中呼叫<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref>沒有註冊的回呼委派或狀態物件的類別。

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref> class that does not have a callback delegate but does have a state object.
trans-unit.target: 從建構函式來初始化的執行個體的衍生類別中呼叫<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref>沒有註冊的回呼委派，但有狀態物件的類別。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件符合或包含非同步作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref> class that has a callback delegate and a state object.
trans-unit.target: 從建構函式來初始化的執行個體的衍生類別中呼叫<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref>已註冊的回呼委派和狀態物件的類別。

trans-unit.source: The method to be called when the asynchronous operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 要在非同步作業完成時呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件符合或包含非同步作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得使用者定義的物件符合或包含非同步作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A user-defined object that qualifies or contains information about an asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 使用者定義的物件符合或包含非同步作業的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，用來等候非同步作業完成。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IAsyncResult.AsyncWaitHandle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle> that is used to wait for an asynchronous operation to complete.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>，用來等候非同步作業完成。</xref:System.Threading.WaitHandle>

trans-unit.source: Call this version of complete when your asynchronous operation is complete and no exception was encountered.
trans-unit.target: 當您的非同步作業完成，且不發生任何例外狀況，請呼叫這一版的完整。

trans-unit.source: It updates the state of the operation and notifies the callback.
trans-unit.target: 它會更新作業的狀態，並通知回呼。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果非同步作業完成同步。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Call this version of complete if you raise an exception during processing.
trans-unit.target: 如果引發例外狀況處理期間，請呼叫這一版的完整。

trans-unit.source: In addition to notifying the callback, it captures the exception and stores it to be thrown during the call to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.End*> method.
trans-unit.target: 除了通知回呼，它會擷取例外狀況並儲存它的呼叫期間會擲回<xref:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.End*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.End*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果非同步作業完成同步。否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred during the processing of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 在非同步作業的處理期間發生的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation completed synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否同步完成非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: For more information see the <xref:System.IAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.IAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.IAsyncResult.CompletedSynchronously%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the asynchronous operation completed synchronously; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果非同步作業完成同步。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體所使用的資源釋出<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Called by the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Dispose"></xref> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Finalize*> methods to release the managed and unmanaged resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 由呼叫<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Dispose"></xref>和<xref:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Finalize*>釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源的目前執行個體所使用的方法<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref>類別</xref:System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult.Finalize*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> indicates that this is an explicit call to Dispose.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指出這為明確呼叫 Dispose。

trans-unit.source: Call this method when the `End` function for the asynchronous operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法時`End`函式的非同步作業已完成。

trans-unit.source: It ensures that the asynchronous operation is complete, and does some common validation.
trans-unit.target: 它會確保非同步作業已完成，且會執行一些常見的驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IAsyncResult> representing the status of the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IAsyncResult>代表非同步作業的狀態。</xref:System.IAsyncResult>

trans-unit.source: Allows the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref> object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 可讓<xref href="System.IdentityModel.AsyncResult"></xref>物件嘗試釋放資源，並透過記憶體回收開始前執行其他清除作業。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the asynchronous operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否已完成非同步作業。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the operation is complete; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果作業已完成。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
